name: TellorToo
description: Ensure the request Id exists in Tellor before using it as a dispute mechanism.

eventDecorators.name: ChallengeSettled
eventDecorators.description: Event emited when a user withdraws his tokens from the bank.

eventDecorators.name: DataChallenged
eventDecorators.description: Event emited when a user withdraws his tokens from the bank.

eventDecorators.name: DataSubmitted
eventDecorators.description: Event emited when a user withdraws his tokens from the bank.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of the withdrawn tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the token which was withdrawn.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the user which withdrawn the tokens.

eventDecorators.name: NewDataset
eventDecorators.description: Event emited when a user withdraws his tokens from the bank.

functionDecorators.name: challengeData
functionDecorators.description: Allows any party to challenged data provided by the centralized oracle.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestId
parameterDecorators.description: is requestId to challenge.

parameterDecorators.name: _timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: to challenge.

functionDecorators.name: getCurrentValue
functionDecorators.description: Allows the user to get the latest value for the requestId specified.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestId
parameterDecorators.description: is the requestId to look up the value for.

functionDecorators.name: getDataBefore
functionDecorators.description: Allows the user to get the first value for the requestId before the specified timestamp.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestId
parameterDecorators.description: is the requestId to look up the value for.

parameterDecorators.name: _timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: before which to search for first verified value.

functionDecorators.name: getNewValueCountbyRequestId
functionDecorators.description: Allows the user to retrieve the number of values saved for the specified requestId.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestId
parameterDecorators.description: is the requestId to look up.

functionDecorators.name: getSupportedIDs
functionDecorators.description: Allows the user to retrieve the supported IDs.

functionDecorators.name: getTimestampbyRequestIDandIndex
functionDecorators.description: Allows the user to retrieve the timestamp specified requestId and index.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestId
parameterDecorators.description: is the requestId to look up.

parameterDecorators.name: _index
parameterDecorators.description: is the index to look up.

functionDecorators.name: isUnderChallenge
functionDecorators.description: Allows the user to check if a value is being challenged.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestId
parameterDecorators.description: is the requestId to look up.

parameterDecorators.name: _timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: is the timestamp to look up.

functionDecorators.name: newDataset
functionDecorators.description: Allows the owner to create add a requestId.

parameterDecorators.name: _referenceRequestId
parameterDecorators.description: is the data type requestId that corresponds to Tellor's requestId on Ethereum.

parameterDecorators.name: _timestampWindow
parameterDecorators.description: is the amount of time a value is allowed to be challenged/disputed.

functionDecorators.name: retrieveData
functionDecorators.description: Allows the user to retrieve the value of the _requestId and _timestamp specified.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestId
parameterDecorators.description: is the requestId to look up a value for.

parameterDecorators.name: _timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: is the timestamp to look up a value for.

functionDecorators.name: settleChallenge
functionDecorators.description: Allows any party to revise the data challenged with Tellor's data.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestId
parameterDecorators.description: is requestId currently under challenge.

parameterDecorators.name: _timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: under challenge.

functionDecorators.name: submitData
functionDecorators.description: Allows centralized oracle to submit data.

parameterDecorators.name: _requestId
parameterDecorators.description: is requestId and should correspond to the requestId in tellor.

parameterDecorators.name: _timestamp
parameterDecorators.description: for the entry.

parameterDecorators.name: _value
parameterDecorators.description: is the current value for the requestId.
